google-readability-casting.description:
Description

The
google-readability-casting
check is an alias, please see
modernize-avoid-c-style-cast
for more information.

Finds usages of C-style casts.

https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Casting

Corresponding cpplint.py check name:
readability/casting
.
google-readability-casting.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
